relevant_findings.general: Somnolent but arousable, alert, answers questions appropriately
relevant_findings.HEENT: NC/AT, PERLA, anicteric, mucus membranes dry
relevant_findings.chest: Tachycardic, no murmur, lungs clear with decreased breath sounds at the bases
relevant_findings.abdomen: Distended, tender diffusely with maximal tenderness in the epigastrium, no rebound, healing laparoscopic incisions

relevant_findings.chest_radiograph: Lung volumes are low. Improved ventilation at the lung bases.
relevant_findings.atelectasis: Unchanged plate-like atelectasis at the left lung apex.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved ventilation at the lung bases compared to the previous radiograph.
